SINT_Execution_Output.Summary: FD and SINT prompt synthesized via Debates (N=4) with Scenario 3B (Consensus). Four tasks prepared for Cases 2–5 with explicit methodologies.

Task.title: AI-Driven Wildfire Response: Detection Latency vs. False Alarm Risk
Task.objective: Run a conflict debate balancing rapid detection and low false-alarm rates in AI-assisted wildfire monitoring and dispatch.
Task.context: Sensor fusion, satellite vs. UAV cadence, dispatch protocols, resource constraints, public safety messaging.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with Divergence Ratings and compromise synthesis.
Task.experts: - Fire Behavior Scientist - Remote Sensing and Perception Engineer - Emergency Dispatch and Public Safety Officer
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings each round; cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Operational thresholds and dispatch triggers with KPIs and safeguards.

Task.title: University Research Funding Allocation Posture
Task.objective: Integrate excellence, equity, and strategic alignment into a consensus model for allocating internal research funds.
Task.context: Peer review bias, early-career support, core facilities, societal impact, matching grants.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus); integration and prioritization.
Task.experts: - Research Policy Director - Faculty Representative (STEM/Humanities balance) - Finance and Grants Officer
Task.constraints: PCG; ratings and cross-evaluation at Step 2; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Prioritized funding rules with measurable targets and review cadence.

Task.title: LLM Inference Cost Control Protocol in Production
Task.objective: Use Generator+Critic to design a cost control protocol for LLM inference while preserving QoS/SLOs.
Task.context: Token budgets, routing to model tiers, caching, guardrails for quality regressions, business SLAs.
Task.methodology: Generator + External Critic (N=2) with corrections and rating gates.
Task.experts: - Platform Optimization Architect (Generator) - Finance and Risk Controller (Critic)
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings for risk/coverage; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Gated cost-control workflow with metrics, test hooks, and rollback triggers.

Task.title: Urban Heat Island Mitigation Portfolio
Task.objective: Conduct a conflict debate to select an investment portfolio reducing urban heat while maintaining mobility and economic activity.
Task.context: Tree canopy, reflective surfaces, transit priority, zoning, energy demand, vulnerable populations.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=4) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with divergence ratings and compromise.
Task.experts: - Climate Adaptation Planner - Transportation Systems Engineer - Urban Economist - Community Health Advocate
Task.constraints: PCG; ratings and cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Ranked portfolio with costs/benefits/risks and deployment triggers.
